name: Robber Duck
description:
As a rubber duck protect your treasure from other thiefs

Controls: 4 people on two X360 gamepads (each person has to share a gamepad with someone else):

  • move - stick
  • pick up - trigger
  • throw/melee attack - bumper

Supports also 1 gamepad + 1 keyboard

  • arrows +
    • numpad return to pick up an item
    • numpad 3 to throw/melee attack
  • WSAD +
    • space to pick up an item
    • E to throw/melee attack
